reviewText: I tried to scoop up all of the seasons of Girlfriends because it was one of my favorite sitcoms that embodied sisterly love,support,breakups and forgiveness. These DVDs a just a token of a gone but not forgotten remembrance of a show that many have enjoyed, and can continue to with a new generation of women.
I can't get enough of watching these dvds. I loved the show when it was on and I would definately recommend getting the dvd to anyone who is a fan
I watch a season every night.  These women are soooooo funny!  This was a great investment.
This is and was the best show on television. WHAT HAPPEN?? Well thanks to Amazon we can enjoy the most top rated show of all time GIRLFRIENDS..............ThX

I love "Girlfriends" a lot! I was a devout fan when it was on tv. I love Joan (Tracee), Maya (Golden), Toni (Jill), and Lynn (Persia). I wished that this show could have received more awards, because it was a really good show to watch and enjoy. I hated that they cancelled the show and went off the air. Their are pretty good scenes in the show that I really like for example, the girl in season one was trying to find out who was seeing her man(Frank) and then she almost got in to it with Joan and chasing her around her house until the girls convinced her that Frank is no good. (Season 1: Importance of being Frank) In the words of Maya and her book I say OH HELL YES TO GIRLFRIENDS!!!!!!!!

The best seasons of the best african american comedy about strong women is now sold together!!I just recieved my set and im still on the first season but i LOVE it---i recommend this set to ALL girlfriend fans

Every year online purchases account for 2/3 to 3/4 of my Xmas shopping.  This year everybody and their brother had issues.  All of my orders were in by November 15th and still I only received partial orders.  This order however arrived earlier than stated.  My wife loves this series and she truly enjoyed the DVDs.  I truly enjoyed having something for her under the tree.  Amazon is the best, bar-none.
i  bought  the dvd  set for  my  wife.  we  have seen  the  show  on  tv  but  not  all of them.  cant  wait  for the  rest of them.
